s: 2 weeks ago - It also boasts a healthy assortment of smart features and a handsome design. The S90D uses a QD-OLED screen, which allows it to control contrast on a pixel basis so black levels are truly black and bright highlights pop with pinpoint precision. Even the most expensive LED and QLED TVs struggle in this area. t: Amazon's TVs have arrived. Here's what you should know.
s: August 20, 2022 - Amazon announced its updated Fire TV family of products, including its first ever Amazon-branded smart TVs, the Amazon Fire TV Omni Series and Amazon Fire TV 4 Series, and a new Fire TV Stick. Both new TVs are available for pre-order on Amazon, and will officially release on October 27.
